p: By using 2-[N-[3,5-bis(trifluoromethyl)benzyl]-N-[6-methoxy-3-(pyrrolidin-1-yl)pyridin-2-yl]methyl]amino-5-(2-methylthioethoxy)pyrimidine instead of 2-[N-[3-(N-cyclopentylmethyl-N-ethyl)amino-6-methoxypyridin-2-yl]methyl-N-(3-trifluoromethylbenzyl)]amino-5-(2-methylthioethoxy)pyrimidine, reactions and treatments were performed in the same manner as those of Example 2 to obtain the title compound as yellow oil.
